data.name: about_content
data.value: <dl> <dt>The Origin of Fermented Fruit Juice</dt> <dd>Fermented juice has existed for centuries, possibly dating back to the ancient Greeks and Romans. These civilizations were some of the first to create fermented juices from apple juice. They would Squeeze the apples and place them in large bins. This process will create a drink that is both alcoholic and carbonated.</dd> </dl> <dl> <dt>DIFFERENCE OF NON-ALVEN fermented fruit juice</dt> <dd>This is also the product direction that FJW is pursuing - a juice made from local fruits with an improvement in the fermentation process made by FJW's proprietary technology, researched researched by the product development department. Usually chilled when drinking or drinking with ice cubes or used as an ingredient in drinking water.</dd> </dl>

data.name: info_des1
data.value: GMP - GOOD MANUFACTURING PRACTICE is a system of good manufacturing practice standards to control factors that can affect the process of product quality formation, to ensure the quality products. The criteria of GMP require manufacturers, processors and packers of drugs, medical devices, certain foods to take proactive steps to ensure that their products are safe.

data.name: info_des2
data.value: HACCP: HAZARD ANALYSIS AND CRITICAL CONTROL POINTS (HACCP) Is a systematic preventive approach to food safety from biological, chemical, physical hazards and more recently radiological hazards in production processes that can cause the finished product to be unsafe and designs measures to reduce these risks to a safe level

data.name: info_des3
data.value: Product announcement means that a manufacturing enterprise or organization or individual declares to the competent authority about the quality of imported or domestically produced products that are allowed to be circulated nationwide or not. This is a mandatory order to be announced before importing or circulating goods across the country.

data.name: npp_hcm
data.value: Outlets in Ho Chi Minh City

data.name: orient_content
data.value: FJW is always dedicated to the guideline of creating good fermented products (juices and tea flowers) for the healthy, free chemical, without preservatives. And Vietnamese agricultural products are the top priority in the selection of raw materials.

data.name: orient_slogan
data.value: As a leading company in creating healthy alcohol-free fermented drinks

data.name: product_content
data.value:
All of FJW's products (Fermented flowers Tea (Kombucha) and Fermented juices) - for those who are always looking for innovation, creativity, rich in Vitamin C and healthy. More specifically, FJW's product categories are completely preservative-free. <dl> <dt>Currently, FJW has 2 main categories:</dt> <dd> - Non-alcoholic fermented ambarella juice: Light sweetness, coolness - Non-alcoholic fermented Passion juice: Sour, refreshing taste - Kombucha fermented flowers tea: Rose, Daisy, Jasmine
</dd> </dl>

data.name: product_slogan
data.value: Fermented Juice and Fermented Flowers Tea

data.name: slogan
data.value: EVERY BOTTLE OF FERMENTED JUICE AND KOMBUCHA FLOWER TEA IS A CREATIVE SOUL
